nodes.text: A fuelstop was located in Milvayne City on the planet Milvayne. It had a repair rig where Chelli Aphra repaired the assassin droid 0-0-0's legs after escaping Tam Posla and the Milvayne Authority. Upon leaving the fuelstop, Aphra and Triple-Zero were pursued by the hunters Nokk and Winloss.
